meanings.definition: A person who is weak or timid.
meanings.sent1: The playground bully always picked on the wussy kid.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a wussy, stand up for yourself!
meanings.sent3: The wussy mouse was afraid of its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The wussy kitten hid from the smallest noise.
meanings.sent5: The wussy puppy cowered at the sight of a butterfly.

meanings.definition: A person who is easily scared or intimidated.
meanings.sent1: The horror movie made the wussy scream in fear.
meanings.sent2: Stop being a wussy and face your fears!
meanings.sent3: The wussy ghost was scared of the dark.
meanings.sent4: The wussy rabbit jumped at every little noise.
meanings.sent5: The wussy child cried at the sight of a spider.
